title: 【八位跨黨派美國議員聯署 致函予林鄭反對「送中條例」】

replies.msg:
八位來自美國參眾兩院的跨黨派議員在當地時間5月23日星期四向行政長官林鄭月娥發信，表示「#逃犯條例」的修訂將會無可挽回地破壞香港的自治以及人權，容許中國政府引渡居於香港商人、記者、人權倡議者以及異見人士。

聯署的八名議員中，有七名出席了5月中於美國國會召開，針對香港人權狀況的聽證會中。美國政界近年對香港議題的關注日益增加，普遍認為香港的人權狀況每況愈下，高度自治日漸受損。這種致予特首的信函相當少見，亦印證了「逃犯條例」修訂極之嚴峻的狀況。

#眾志國際連結 #反送中

A bipartisan, bicameral group of eight members of the U.S. Congress has sent a letter dated Thursday, May 23, to Chief Executive Carrie Lam opposing proposed amendments to Hong Kong’s extradition laws. They write: “We believe the proposed legislation would irreparably damage Hong Kong’s cherished autonomy and protections for human rights by allowing the Chinese government to request extradition of business persons, journalists, rights advocates, and political activists residing in Hong Kong.” The signatories are:
• Massachusetts Congressman Jim McGovern
• Florida Senator Marco Rubio
• New Jersey Congressman Chris Smith
• Montana Senator Steve Daines
• New York Congressman Thomas Suozzi
• Arkansas Senator Tom Cotton
• Florida Congressman Brian Mast
• Utah Congressman Ben McAdams
